title: Updated version of WildFly Administration guide available!
content: Fresh take on WildFly Administration Guide ! An updated version of the book is available, covering all the details of the latest version of the application server (WildFly 32) ! Are you ready to unlock the power of WildFly 32, the most popular application server? The all-new WildFly Administration Guide has been updated to cover ...  The post appeared first on .
